page.title: 02FARMING
page.content: {GREENSIDE FARM (NEWHOUSE)} The largest of the four with 280 acres rented and 170 acres owned.It concentrated on a mixture of dairy and arable farming. Their livestock consisted of dairy cattle,which they milked themselves, bottling the milk within the farm.The cattle types were Fresian and Aryshire, which were milked at 6.00am and 4.00pm. Land use involved oats, peas(new venture) and beans.The soil type was considered HEAVY. Products sold included, milk, peas, oats(porridge) and beans. People employed in the farm were mainly family, aided by five employees.
